Reading Reimagined

We're transforming the way people read and understand content by bringing text to life through intelligent AI-powered visualizations. No more struggling to imagine complex concepts.

Our Mission

To fundamentally improve reading accessibility and engagement for a new generation of readers

Our Team

A passionate group of innovators, designers, and engineers dedicated to creating the future of reading.

Our Vision

A future where reading is an engaging, accessible, and multi-sensory experience for everyone, including those who find traditional books a barrier

Our Values

Innovation, accessibility, and user engagement are at the core of everything we build, from our AI pipeline to our final user interface

VisuaLit Features

A New Way to Experience Stories

Our AI-driven features transform static ebooks into immersive, multi-sensory experiences designed for a new generation of readers.

AI Character & Scene Visualization

See your story come to life. Our AI generates stunning images of characters and key scenes as you read.

Learn more

Immersive Multi-Voice Audiobooks

Our AI assigns unique, character-specific voices, turning your ebook into a full-cast audio drama.

Learn more

Enhanced UI & Integrated Dictionary

Stay in the flow with a clean, modern interface that features an integrated dictionary for contextual learning.

Learn more

Cross-Platform (iOS & Android)

Built with Flutter, VisuaLit provides a seamless, native reading experience on both iOS and Android devices.

Learn more

Designed for Accessibility

Our core mission is to help struggling readers and neurodivergent individuals with integrated visual and auditory aids.

Learn more

Reading Streaks & Gamification

Stay motivated and build a consistent reading habit with gamified elements like our reading streak tracker.

Learn more

Advanced NLP Pipeline

Our 'agentic NLP pipeline' (using spaCy & BookNLP) accurately identifies characters and scenes to power the AI.

Learn more

Creative 'Brainrot' Audio Format

A unique, creative audiobook format designed specifically to engage and capture the attention of younger generations.

Learn more

Our Story

Our journey started in a university classroom, where we came together as friends to complete a module for our degree. The project was, at first, an academic requirement.

But as we delved into the research, we were struck by a clear problem: for many, reading is a barrier, not a gateway. Traditional books often lack the engagement needed for young minds and the accessibility required by neurodiverse individuals. Our "project" suddenly found its "purpose."

What began as an assignment became a mission. We saw the power of combining AI-driven visuals and immersive audio to create a truly multi-sensory reading experience. When the semester ended, our team made a unanimous decision: this was too important to leave behind. We are now committed to taking VisuaLit from a concept to a platform that reimagines reading for everyone.

Cutting Edge Innovation Award

In the Project Showcase category at IIT's Cutting Edge event, VisuaLit secured Third Place. This award recognized the quality, completeness, and innovative spirit of our early-stage project.

CodeSprint Excellence Award

VisuaLit was awarded 1st Runners Up. This achievement at the IEEE Student Branch of IIT's competition was a powerful validation of our technology and its performance against a highly competitive field.

SLIIT CodeFest Recognition

We were honored to receive recognition at SLIIT CODEFEST, highlighting both the technical innovation and community impact of our project.
